hotels.vendor_name: Omni New Haven Hotel at Yale
hotels.title: Chic New Haven Retreat Moments from Yale University with Rooftop Restaurant & Onsite Wellness Centre
hotels.description: Soak up the collegiate atmosphere with a sophisticated stay at this upscale abode in New Haven, perfectly situated mere steps from the historic Yale University. Relish New England cuisine at the 19th-floor restaurant, John Davenport's at the Top of the Park, offering panoramic views of Long Island Sound and the Yale campus, or sip on fine cocktails at Bar 19. The Yale University Art Gallery and Yale Center for British Art are within easy reach for culture enthusiasts, while gourmands will delight in the city's renowned Neapolitan pizza scene. Return to your after a day of exploratio and head to the onsite Ripple Float & Wellness Center and indulge in myriad relaxing treatments, including floatation tanks, cryotherapy, infrared sauna and massages.
